ygData.subject: Banks
ygData.msgSnippet: Anyone else here think that they should make joint bank accounts? Have a limit on the number of people that can go into it. This would be great for people into
ygData.messageBody:
Anyone else here think that they should make joint bank accounts? Have a
limit on the number of people that can go into it. This would be great for
people into trade skills. 2 friends smithing together, put all profit into
the account. Have it completely seperate from the original ones. And have all
players consent to it, so that Verant can't do anything about stolen money.
Just say sorry. I think this would be very cool. What other people think?

Kondor, Half Elf Paladin
~Veeshan~
